snippet: Serena Williams retired during her Hopman Cup match in Perth on Tuesday, completing a day of injuries and upsets for the leading women's players less than two weeks from the Australian Open....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams retired during her Hopman Cup match in Perth on Tuesday, completing a day of injuries and upsets for the leading women's players less than two weeks from the Australian Open.

headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Withdraws at Perth, Injury Toll Grows
headline.main: Serena Williams Withdraws at Perth, Injury Toll Grows
